members.name: language
members.description: The language of the settings interface

members.name: contentLanguage
members.description: The language to use for locale-aware formatting and labels

members.name: hideDisplaySettings
members.description: Whether or not to show the displaySettings. Is used to hide display Settings in cases where there are multiple columns

members.name: binningDisabled
members.description: Whether or not to show the binning in numeric

members.name: grandTotals
members.description: Whether or not to show the grand totals

members.name: periodOverPeriod
members.description: Whether or not to show the period-over-period in numeric

members.name: showRemoveButton
members.description: Whether or not to show the trash button next to the label

members.name: slotType
members.description: The slot type

members.name: measureColumns
members.description: The list of columns that can be used for the rate aggregation

events.name: slot-content-changed
events.description: Event that is fired when the slot content is changed

declarations.name: AGGREGATIONS
declarations.default: { sum: () => msg('Sum', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), cumulativesum: () => msg('Cumulative sum', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), average: () => msg('Average', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), weightedaverage: () => msg('Weighted average', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), median: () => msg('Median', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), count: () => msg('Count', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), distinctcount: () => msg('Distinct count', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), min: () => msg('Minimum', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), max: () => msg('Maximum', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), stddev: () => msg('Standard deviation', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }), rate: () => msg('Rate', { desc: 'Numeric Aggregation option' }) }

declarations.name: DURATION_FORMATS
declarations.default: { time: () => msg('Time', { desc: 'Time format option' }), short: () => msg('Short', { desc: 'Short format option' }), long: () => msg('Long', { desc: 'Long format option' }) }

declarations.name: NUMERIC_SEPARATOR_FORMATS
declarations.default: { Auto: { auto: true, label: () => msg('Auto', { desc: 'Automatic setting of the option' }) }, '1,000.00': { auto: false, label: () => '1,000.00', thousandSeparator: ',', decimalSeparator: '.' }, '1.000,00': { auto: false, label: () => '1.000,00', thousandSeparator: '.', decimalSeparator: ',' }, '1000.00': { auto: false, label: () => '1000.00', decimalSeparator: '.' }, '1000,00': { auto: false, label: () => '1000,00', decimalSeparator: ',' } }

declarations.name: DURATION
declarations.default: { levels: [ { level: 1, label: 'years' }, { level: 2, label: 'quarters' }, { level: 3, label: 'months' }, { level: 4, label: 'weeks' }, { level: 5, label: 'days' }, { level: 6, label: 'hours' }, { level: 7, label: 'minutes' }, { level: 8, label: 'seconds' }, { level: 9, label: 'milliseconds' } ] }

declarations.name: LEVEL_LIST
declarations.default: [ { key: 'periods', i18n: () => msg('Periods', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'years', i18n: () => msg('Years', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'quarters', i18n: () => msg('Quarters', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'months', i18n: () => msg('Months', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'weeks', i18n: () => msg('Weeks', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'days', i18n: () => msg('Days', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'hours', i18n: () => msg('Hours', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'minutes', i18n: () => msg('Minutes', { desc: 'Period option' }) }, { key: 'seconds', i18n: () => msg('Seconds', { desc: 'Period option' }) } ]

members.name: language
members.description: The language in which to display the option configuration controls.

members.name: itemType
members.description: The item type to load the configuration for. Leave empty if using a custom options configuration.

members.name: options
members.description: The options of the item.

members.name: slots
members.description: The slots of the item.

members.name: theme
members.description: The theme of the item.

members.name: size
members.description: The size of the edit item component.

members.name: optionsConfiguration
members.description: The configuration of the options. Fill in manually if you want to use a custom configuration. Leave empty if using a default configuration and use 'item-type'.

members.name: translations
members.description: The translations of the item options configuration.
